message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this exceptional opportunity to you. The product I have to offer is truly unique and valuable, and I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business. Given its intrinsic worth and the benefits it provides, I am extending an offer to purchase it from me at $12000. This price reflects not only the cost of acquisition but also the potential value it can bring to you. I understand that the true value may be subjective, and I am open to discussing any concerns or questions you might have. Let's make this a mutually beneficial transaction.
